text: Sarpagandha is also known as 'Indian snakeroot', 'Chandrabhaga' or 'Chhota Chandis'. It is an important medicinal plant distributed in the foot-hills of the Himalayan range. It has long tapering snake-like roots which are a rich source of reserpine alkaloids. Category:Plants of Asia Category:Apocynaceae
title: Rauvolfia serpentina
